author: pgoldstein
msg: Adjusted MimeMessageWrapper so that the internal MailHeaders object is properly updated.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for the fix.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Fixed the code so it logs an error message to the error log, rather than feeding to System.err
Thanks to Noel Bergman for the fix.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Changed the terminating mailet to produce a warning in the logs
when it is reached by emails that are not in an ERROR state.
Thanks to Noel Bergman for the fix.

author: pgoldstein
msg: Added comments, removed unused Contextualizable interface.

author: pgoldstein
msg: This patch is designed to appropriately handle certain error conditions that may arise in mail storage
